title: Handle a Return to Vendor (RTV)
description: A product is found to be defective and needs to be returned to the original supplier for credit.

tasks.description: Identify the defective stock and the original purchase order it came from.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the PO for the defective items.

tasks.description: Contact the supplier to get authorization to return the defective goods.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supplier provides a Return to Vendor (RTV) authorization number.

tasks.description: Pack the defective goods and ship them back to the supplier.
Track the return shipment and ensure a credit is received from the supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the supplier has received the return and issued a credit.
